text: Their curry rice has tasty flavors, good portion sizes, and is reasonably priced. Ps must try their unagi don legit flavorful

+ Great taste. Portion not that big though.

+ The stall sells quite a variety of dishes including donburi, udon, Japanese curry, Ishiyaki (fried rice).

- Prices are reasonable.

+ Located in quiet hidden corner of the estate. Less hot and expensive compared to the other nearby coffeeshop at 209B Clementi Ave 6.

+ Ample sheltered MSCP parking next door.

- Few other stall options in this coffeeshop if your companions want to try something else.
The best japanese food ever for this price to have like the standard of famous japan restaurant. Definitely come again! :)

Recommended this place by my sis!

The pork curry Katsu Don is really amazing! The pork cutlet is so soft and juicy! The curry was so flavourful! A match made in heaven!! Restaurant grade at hawker price! Super worth while!

Lots of parking here and easy to find a seat!

Definitely will come back again!!

As a fussy eater, I have always been skeptical about finding "authentic" jap food in a kopitiam setting. However, I must say that this shop is really underrated!! My go to order is always the same: Beef Curry Udon for $7.90 that comes with a generous serving! Sooo good!! Please dont ever close down, your food is really ðŸ’¯
